name: drunk girl ruins her life
description:
An office party gets way out of hand the night before an important meeting.

Will Sandra save the day and get that promotion she's been working towards for 10 years?

Or will the department be burnt to the ground by the crazy executives?

Find out in "drunk girl ruins her life"!

FEATURES:

  • Explain where the missing $4 billion went!
  • Motion to pie charts and make awkward coughs during meetings!
  • A guy who can jump over houses but no-one believes him!
  • Music!
  • 2,000 rampaging snakes!

Playtime: ~5-10 minutes

Controls:

  • Alt+Enter for Full Screen
  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Hold Shift to run
  • Space or Enter to interact
  • ESC Key to Save/Quit Game

Co-written by qualifiedbadger and Chris Cantrill! www.christopher-cantrill.com

If you don't know what the "RPGMaker RTP" is, hello! Download the "(RTP Included)" version and the game will automatically run! If you do know, just use the other one obviously. ;)
